document.title: How to analyze a project
document.paragraph:
The metric tab in the context tool allows project analyzing. Built on a suitable metric theory, this tool provides a set of elementary metrics that can be evaluated to test projects design and implementation. The metric tool provides the following interface to evaluate measures, save them or delete some of them when no longerneeded.
/images/eiffelstudio/metrics_png/metric_tool.png See section:
10_computing_a_measure/00_introduction.xml Computing a measure
This tool also allows users to define their own metrics. Indeed, users may have specific requirements and the set of metrics provided by default could be insufficient. See section:
20_handling_new_metrics/00_introduction.xml Handling new metrics
Eventually, it is also possible to evaluate metrics for a different project than the currently loaded, and to compare systems one to another. See section:
30_handling_archives/00_introduction.xml Handling archives
